682900.name: Fantasy Grounds - Disposable Heroes: Sci-Fi Aliens (Token Pack)
682900.description:
Disposable Heroes: Sci-Fi Aliens

Sci-Fi Token Pack
This product is an installable module containing tokens for use with the Fantasy
Grounds II virtual tabletop. Upon activating the module, the tokens will appear in
your Token box for use throughout your game. They have been organized by genre and
product name to make it easy to use multiple token pack modules within your game.
Tokens are scaled and organized in the following sizes for medium creatures: 32x32,
50x50, 75x75 and 100x100 pixels. This allows you to use the token quality that best
meets your needs.
This set contains full-color token representations of 30 unique and unusual sci-fi alien figures, beautifully illustrated and colored by Matthew Vasey. Two formats are included: full-body figures and top-cropped figures for a larger image.
Fantasy Grounds II Conversion: Brett M. Bernstein
Other downloadable and printed Disposable Heroes paper miniatures and counters, as well as other quality products, can be found at .
Ruleset Compatibility: Any
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by:
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and any ruleset.
Screenshots may differ from what you see in-game based on the extension and ruleset you have loaded.
